attributes.action: Allow people on higher rate of attendance allowance to use the Motability Scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People with severe mobility problems caused by such illnesses as Multiple Sclerosis who are over the age of 65 when diagnosed are forced to purchase their own adapted cars, without help and are even forced to pay car tax when younger more agile people do not.

Please sign this petition to ask that the Government allow them to join the Motability Scheme.
